modName: Shadowmere cannot die V2 _Now also Frost_
summary:
Ever had too reload a save just because shadowmere or frost died, knowing that these trusty 1 in a kind companions would never be seen again if you didnt?
This mod stops that and makes Shadowmere and Frost invincible.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes Shadowmere non-killable, even from falls!
Codes are (if you lost him)
player.placeatme 0009CCD7
if that doesnt work try
player.placeatme 0009CCD8
Shadowmere will get up after death if he dies, like an essencial NPC.
This shouldn\'t conflict with any mods unless they edit frost and/or shadowmere.

Version 2 : Added frost as well, for anyone who likes him out there :)
player.placeatme 00097E1F
if that doesnt work:
player.placeatme 00097E1E

Please rate if you liked it!
Also comment with improvements and bugs, conflicts etc.

(Was posted as request)
Steam link: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=19862
author: Linky1

files.name: Shadowmere cannot die V2_1 _Still includes frost_
